Take Me Back Where I Came From
Hello blank fragment Take me back where I came from It is necessary that you grant the app a permission to track your current location. It is used only for the correct app work and will not be shared to anyone. This application is being developed for the fulfillment of the requirements of the MSc course in Advanced Software Engineering at the University of Sheffield. All rights reserved.> Developer: Aleksandr Sergeev> Supervisor: Prof. Fabio Ciravegna
